name: RecipeSubstitutes
0:
”Alexa, open Recipe Substitutes.”
”What can I use for butter?”
”How can I replace self rising flour?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe substitutes
des: Are you out of buttermilk, don't have self-rising flour, or wonder what you can use instead of just about any ingredient in your recipe? This is the skill for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
